blocks.block_text: " It is Swedenborg's theory , that every organ is made up of homogeneous particles ; or , as it is sometimes expressed , every whole is made of similars , that is , the lungs are composed of infinitely small lungs , the liver , of infinitely small livers ; the kidney , of little kidneys , & c . Following this ana- logy if any man is found to carry with him the power and affecti- ons of vast numbers , if Napoleon is France , if Napoleon ig Europe , it is because the poeple whom
lines: " It is Swedenborg's theory , that every organ is made up of homogeneous particles ; or , as it is sometimes expressed , every whole is made of similars , that is , the lungs are composed of infinitely small lungs , the liver , of infinitely small livers ; the kidney , of little kidneys , & c . Following this ana- logy if any man is found to carry with him the power and affecti- ons of vast numbers , if Napoleon is France , if Napoleon ig Europe , it is because the poeple whom
